vclaim: Following the Jan. 6, 2021, insurrection at the U.S. Capitol, a listing on the auction site eBay was created for the “House of Representatives Speaker Podium.”
title: Was US House Speaker’s ‘Podium’ Listed on eBay?
subtitle: The listing occurred after an unidentified man was pictured carrying such an object in the Capitol.
author: Madison Dapcevich
